title: Toxic chemicals in salons, lack of education lead to adverse health effects

title_detail.value: Toxic chemicals in salons, lack of education lead to adverse health effects

summary: Clients who frequent hair and nail salons exhibit more skin and fungal diseases than those who visit less often and nail salon technicians are receiving inadequate training in the use of chemicals, suggest two recent studies.

summary_detail.value: Clients who frequent hair and nail salons exhibit more skin and fungal diseases than those who visit less often and nail salon technicians are receiving inadequate training in the use of chemicals, suggest two recent studies.
